sentence.Network_en: This unexpected move serves to draw the black rook into the game.

sentence.Network_en: I, said Rook, With my little book, I'll be the person.
sentence.Network_cn: 是我, 乌鸦说, 我将为他当牧师, 用我的小本子.

sentence.Network_en: This was sacrificing a pawn to save a rook.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ... 所谓车王易位是西洋棋中的特殊走法, 让玩家可以将车(rook)移动到王的另一边, 这样一来就多出一些可能性...这种譬喻法挺幽默的.

月中的时候白嘴鸦（rook）开始筑巢，画眉（blackbird）开始在枝头婉转啼鸣。开花植物和花蕾的数量比2010年增加了17%。

list.abs: 3?钩指触诊法(}rook method) 适用于儿童和腹壁薄软者，触诊时，检查者位于被检查者右肩旁，面向其足部，将右手掌搭在其右前胸 …

they rooked the old man of his money .他们骗取了这位老人的钱。
城市乌鸦(Urban rook)/乔纳斯·萨尔蒙森(瑞典)   穿过德国Greifswald小镇,拍摄天空或者树梢的鸦群,突然,我注意到了一堵不寻常的“墙”,架起相机的时候,一只.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English hrōc, probably imitative and of Germanic origin; related to Dutch roek
Middle English: from Old French rock, based on Arabic ruḵḵ (of which the sense remains uncertain)

entry.def: A rook is a large black bird. Rooks are members of the crow family.
In chess, a rook is one of the chess pieces which stand in the corners of the board at the beginning of a game. Rooks can move forwards, backwards, or sideways, but not diagonally.

means.word_mean: 1. (chess) the piece that can move any number of unoccupied squares in a direction parallel to the sides of the chessboard
2. common gregarious Old World bird about the size and color of the American crow

sentences.sentence: "He swindled me out of my inheritance"
"She defrauded the customers who trusted her"
"the cashier gypped me when he gave me too little change"
